mapper.update: update erp_repo_receipt_detail set deleted = 1 where receipt_id in ( #{id})
mapper.select: select , etr.code testCode, etr.id testId from erp_repo_receipt_detail errd left join erp_product ep on errd.product_id = ep.id and ep.deleted = 0 left join erp_test_report etr on etr.product = ep.id and etr.deleted = 0 left join erp_repository_receipt err on err.id = errd.receipt_id and err.related_order = etr.order_no where errd.deleted = 0 and errd.receipt_id = #{receiptId}

select from erp_repo_receipt_detail errd left join erp_repository_receipt err on err.id = errd.receipt_id and err.deleted = 0 left join erp_product ep on errd.product_id = ep.id and ep.deleted = 0 left join erp_test_report etr on etr.id = errd.test_id and etr.deleted = 0 left join erp_repository er on er.id = errd.repository_id and er.deleted = 0 where err.related_order_id = #{orderId} and err.type = #{businessType}

select errd.id, ep.id product, ep.name productName, errd.plate_no, errd.num srcNum, errd.grade srcGrade from erp_repo_receipt_detail errd left join erp_repository_receipt err on err.id = errd.receipt_id and err.deleted = 0 left join erp_product ep on ep.deleted = 0 and ep.id = errd.product_id where errd.deleted = 0 and err.type = 'product_delivery' and err.related_order_id = #{id}

SELECT d.id, d.receipt_id AS receiptId, d.product_id AS productId, p.`name` AS productName, d.voucher_no AS voucherNo, d.wet_weight AS wetWeight, d.unit, d.repository_id AS repositoryId, r.`name` AS repositoryName, d.test_id AS testId, t.`code` AS testCode, d.water_rate AS waterRate, d.num, d.record_time AS recordTime FROM erp_repo_receipt_detail d LEFT JOIN erp_product p ON d.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN erp_repository r ON d.repository_id = r.id LEFT JOIN erp_test_report t ON d.test_id = t.id WHERE 1=1 AND d.receipt_id =#{receiptId} AND d.deleted=0
